author: kameshj
msg: (main): Check for sanity of argument combinations for --depth and
--relocate without bothering about sub command name 'switch', as relocate

author: kameshj
msg: (main): Check for sanity of argument combinations only once after
parsing all the arguments for --auto-props and --no-auto-props.

author: kameshj
msg: different thought of showcasing the pain in resolving the conflicts
and finally deleting the file itself. But the fix to issue 2876
fixes the problem itself. So cleanup the testcase.

author: kameshj
msg: Fix issue 2876 - "Merge on parent having subtree with differing mergeinfo
which is getting deleted by the current merge fails".
No need to do anything on a children_with_mergeinfo's item that
Summarize the merge. If any path is found to be deleted remove it from
'*children_with_mergeinfo' and continue with next subtree without doing
any merge on this to be deleted subtree.
Force the merge so that 'locally modified file' won't get skipped upon

author: vgeorgescu
msg: Fix a depth-related backward compatibility problem when old clients interact
svn_depth_unknown, which is not a valid depth for svn_repos_set_path3.
